languages.text: "Ты оставила ее около поста вокс-оператора на мостике. Лучше забери ее, пока офицеру не влетело за распитие на рабочем месте".
"You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."
languages.original_text: "Ты оставила ее около поста вокс-оператора на мостике. Лучше забери ее, пока офицеру не влетело за распитие на рабочем месте".

traits.locale_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “是你自己把它忘在了舰桥，放在了音阵操作员的工作台上。你应该赶紧把它拿回来，否则某个军官就要因为工作期间酗酒遭到惩处了。”
languages.original_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."

traits.locale_text: “是你自己把它忘在了舰桥，放在了音阵操作员的工作台上。你应该赶紧把它拿回来，否则某个军官就要因为工作期间酗酒遭到惩处了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «La dejó en la estación del operador de vocos del puente. Debería recuperarla antes de que castiguen al oficial por beber en su puesto».
languages.original_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."

traits.locale_text: «La dejó en la estación del operador de vocos del puente. Debería recuperarla antes de que castiguen al oficial por beber en su puesto».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ブリッジの音声オペレーターステーションの近くに置き忘れたんだろう。士官が持ち場で酒を飲んだと叱責される前に、回収した方がいい」
languages.original_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."

traits.locale_text: 「ブリッジの音声オペレーターステーションの近くに置き忘れたんだろう。士官が持ち場で酒を飲んだと叱責される前に、回収した方がいい」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt sie an der Station des Vox-Operateurs auf der Brücke liegen lassen. Ihr solltet sie holen, bevor der Offizier in Versuchung geführt wird, während seiner Schicht zu trinken."
languages.original_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt sie an der Station des Vox-Operateurs auf der Brücke liegen lassen. Ihr solltet sie holen, bevor der Offizier in Versuchung geführt wird, während seiner Schicht zu trinken."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous l'avez oubliée sur le pont, près du poste de l'opérateur-vox. Vous devriez la récupérer, avant que cet officier ne se fasse réprimander pour avoir bu en service. »
languages.original_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."

traits.locale_text: « Vous l'avez oubliée sur le pont, près du poste de l'opérateur-vox. Vous devriez la récupérer, avant que cet officier ne se fasse réprimander pour avoir bu en service. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Köprüdeki voks operatörünün istasyonunda bırakmışsın. Subay görev başında içki içtiği için ceza yemeden önce geri alsan iyi olur."
languages.original_text: "You left it by the vox operator's station on the bridge. You should reclaim it before the officer is upbraided for drinking at their post."

traits.locale_text: "Köprüdeki voks operatörünün istasyonunda bırakmışsın. Subay görev başında içki içtiği için ceza yemeden önce geri alsan iyi olur."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
